explanation: [0-0] In a room, a young man wearing black clothes sits at a table with a blue tablecloth, holding an egg in his right hand and smiling at the camera.

[0-10] Then, the man opens his mouth wide, puts the egg in, and takes out the eggshell with a surprised expression. He then raises his index finger to his lips, gesturing for silence. Subsequently, he holds a tomato and a coin in his hand, placing the coin on the tomato. The man picks up the eggshell and puts the tomato inside. Then, he puts the egg back in the egg carton.
